author: dadams
msg: TAPESTRY-1653: Provide automatic ValueEncoders for Hibernate entities

author: gkossakowski
msg: HttpEnvironment is a Spring bean now!
Moved initialization of HttpContext to HttpEnvironment.

author: gkossakowski
msg: AbstractEnvironment does not extend AbstractLogEnabled anymore.

author: gkossakowski
msg: * SitemapServlet does not depend on RequestUtil anymore
* HttpEnvironment is more self-contained (calculates URI for its own)
* removed getCompleteBlockUri() method which duplicated functionality from SSF
* removed support for special redirections (handled by SSF as well)
* removed uri parameter from other methods, RequestUtil can calculate this on its own
